mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.tender_id AS "tenderId", a.open_bid_num AS "openBidNum", a.subpackage_program_id AS "subpackageProgramId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO open_bid_tab( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, tender_id, open_bid_num, subpackage_program_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{tenderId}, #{openBidNum}, #{subpackageProgramId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE open_bid_tab SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, tender_id = #{tenderId}, open_bid_num = #{openBidNum}, subpackage_program_id = #{subpackageProgramId} WHERE id = #{id}
